Class COM.sootNsmoke.jvm.ConstantRef 

java.lang.Object
   |

           +----COM.sootNsmoke.jvm.ConstantRef
public abstract class ConstantRef
extends GenericConstant
Fieldref's, Methodref's, and InterfaceMethodref's all contain exactly the same data. This class serves as a base to all three.

See Also:
Fieldref, Methodref, InterfaceMethodref

class_index
name_and_type_index

class_index()
Index of the ConstantClass which holds the field/method
name_and_type_index()
Index of the NameAndType which names the field/method and gives its type descriptor
